function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of experimental verification for predicted virus protein structures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ai and measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges with ai models due to lack of historical data and noisy
